# This is deprecated and will be removed in the future.  It also doesn't do
# anything anyways.  Prefer to use the library associated with the API you are
# using.
absl_cc_library(
  NAME
    container
  PUBLIC
)

absl_cc_library(
  NAME
    compressed_tuple
  HDRS
    "internal/compressed_tuple.h"
  COPTS
    ${ABSL_DEFAULT_COPTS}
  DEPS
    absl_utility
  PUBLIC
)

absl_cc_test(
  NAME
    compressed_tuple_test
  SRCS
    "internal/compressed_tuple_test.cc"
  COPTS
    ${ABSL_TEST_COPTS}
  DEPS
    absl_compressed_tuple
    absl_memory
    absl_utility
    gmock_main
)

    absl_core_headers

    absl_memory

)

    "fixed_array_test.cc"

    ${ABSL_EXCEPTIONS_FLAG_LINKOPTS}
  DEPS
    absl_fixed_array

    absl_hash_testing
    absl_memory
    gmock_main
)
